recommendations: Muhi Sirajuddin
Project Manager at PRA Health Sciences
June 17, 2016, Muhi was a client of Max’s

I had the pleasure of working with Max- and he has been the only recruiter with whom I felt I was not just a paycheck or a means to an end.  Max genuinely cared about my future career goals and aspirations and provided frank feedback both on a job and company level.  He had a great understanding of what the position he is recruiting for entails and strives to find each candidate the best fit position.  I would without a doubt work with Max again, and recommend him to anyone without hesitation.

summary: Corporate Job Bank is the largest locally owned staffing organization in Arizona.  We have earned the coveted Platinum Ranking from AZ Business Magazine and have been recognized regionally by The Phoenix Business Journal for both direct hire and temporary staffing services.Corporate Job Bank was founded in 1985 with one simple premise, matching talented individuals with opportunities and companies in need of talent.  The motto, “Our People Make the Difference” was born and the company’s vision was clear.With an initial emphasis in the mortgage industry, Corporate Job Bank quickly grew a solid regional reputation and expanded to be the largest locally owned staffing agency in Arizona.Corporate Job Bank was awarded the State of Arizona’s Temporary Staffing Services contract over a decade ago.  Since that time, we have serviced hundreds of state agencies and local municipalities under the State Contract.
name: Max Packer
